Name: Boba Powder
Description: The magic stuff to make the good stuff!

DescriptionLocalization.es: Pequeñas flores comestibles que atraen abejas, mariposas y colibríes.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 꿀벌, 나비, 벌새를 끌어들이는 작은 식용 꽃입니다!
DescriptionLocalization.de: Kleine essbare Pflanze, die Bienen, Schmetterlinge und Kolibris anzieht.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Petites fleurs comestibles qui attirent les abeilles, les papillons et les colibris!
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Apró, ehető virágok, melyek vonzzák a méheket, lepkéket, és a kolibriket is!
DescriptionLocalization.ja: ミツバチ、蝶、ハチドリを引き付ける小さな食用花！
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Pequenas flores comestíveis que atraem abelhas, borboletas e beija-flores!
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Маленькие съедобные цветы, привлекающие пчел, бабочек и колибри!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一朵可食用的小花，蜜蜂，蝴蝶，和蜂鸟常常被其香味吸引！
